The Protectobots:



A blue fire truck's engines roared as Hot Spot arrived on the scene, the 
truck slowing down to 10 MPH, the hose shooting off high-pressured water at 
Megatron's chest in an attempt to knock him over.  "Not so fast, Megatron 
wanna be!"

Groove wordlessly sped up to a speed of 100 MPH, transforming quickly to his 
biped form, the Autobot now flying through the air, descending rapidly, arms 
outstretched in an attempt to tackle Rumble.  But he noticed Rumble had 
fallen to the ground to his chagrin, and all he was going to do was crash on 
top of Rumble, unless the target got out of the way.

The roar of a helicopter's blades entered the area as an AH-46 Apache Attack 
Helicopter arrived in the general vacinity.  But this was no ordinary attack 
craft, it was an Autobot!  But he had not followed the same course of his 
brethren, he had circled around to come up behind the intruders!  

"Look out behind ya!" Blades' voice eminated from the apache towards the 
Decepticons, one of the cannons on the helicopter's nose firing off twenty 
30mm rounds at Soundwave's torso from behind.

Streetwise's form twisted into a biped form, photon pistol in hand.  He 
surveyed the area, watching the backs of his fellow Autobots and Maximals as 
well as keeping an optic out for more 'Cons.

First Aid stopped, but didn't transform.  He let his sensors search for any 
injured allies.  "Be careful!" his voice warned to everyone else.
